Episode 24- One Bedroom Series

In this video, I went through the basic steps on how to set up a sheet to printing in AutoCAD Architecture 2020/2021. At the end of this video, you should become familiar with sheet templates, field texts, sheet set manager, sheet sets, subsets, project navigator, title blocks, etc.

I hope that you learn a thing or 3. Do me a flavour - try one of the below...

Subscribe / Share / Comment / Like

TIMELINE CONTENT
0:00 - Intro
1:45 - How to do a basic Location Map
3:16 - Field Text and Project Details
6:48 - Sheet Template
12:46 - Sheet Set Manager, Sheet Sets and Subsets
14:40 - Creating New Sheets/Modify Sheet Properties
20:29 - Adding Views to Sheets
22:45 - Creating a Sheet List/Table of Content
24:50 - Adding Views to Sheets (con't)
32:55 - Mapping Callouts and Section Tags
34:55 - Printing and Reviewing
38:28 - Outro
